pageContext.claim: “Look at Omar. She came in here did she marry her brother. Where's that writer? That writer -- That writer should be given the Pulitzer Prize. He never will be.”
pageContext.analysis: This very serious charge about Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.) has not been proven. It appears to have originated with a Trump supporter posting on a message board called Somali Spot, as the Daily Beast reported.
